name: 8-Week Wheel (All Levels)
description:
Winter Session:
Jan 16, 23, 30, Feb 6, 13, 20, 27, Mar 6
2 hour class. 6:30-8:30. 8 weeks. $190*

*Class prices include one 25lb bag of clay, glazes and firings. Additional clay can be purchased. ($15 stoneware, $20 porcelain).

POLICIES: Email me at artzy_grl@yahoo.com or call 440.785.5409 with any questions. I accept checks, cash or any major credit card. You must pay in order to secure your space in the class. No exceptions. No refunds will be given without 7 days notice before the start date of the class. Any cancellations during a session are not eligible for a refund. I cannot prorate the fee if you are going to miss a class however you may make up a class during open studio. Make up classes must occur during the 6 week class session.

name: All Levels Hand Building/Wheel Throwing
description:
Learn to make beautiful clay objects from start to finish! Students will explore various ceramics techniques including pinch pots, coil building, slab building, wheel throwing, and decorating. No experience necessary! Come to class with a curious mind, ready to play with clay!

Wednesdays. 6 weeks. $165 includes all firings, glazes and (1) 25lb bag of clay. 
Jan 15, 22, 29. Feb 5, 12, 19.
Bio: Lauren Herzak-Bauman received a BFA in Ceramics at Bowling Green State University and an MFA in Studio Art from The University of Minnesota in Minneapolis. While her primary art focus is ceramic sculpture, other recent artistic endeavors include building art-inspired ice shanties on a frozen lake, making large art installations in a condemned house, and throwing thousands of bowls for charity. Currently, she teaches in the Foundations Department at Cleveland Institute of Art and makes art in her studio at The Screw Factory in Lakewood, Ohio.

name: 1-Day Pass
description:
Students will have access to the equipment during open studio hours and must sign and agree to the policies of the studio. 
The fee includes glazes and firings. Clay must be purchased for $15/stoneware or $20/porcelain. Bags are 25lbs. 

Please note there is NO instruction provided during open studio times. Students who need instruction should sign up for the Monday or Thursday class. 

This package is good for one month from the date of purchase. 

Visit https://www.facebook.com/GinaDeSantisCeramics for a calendar listing of times.
